Our goal is two build a tool for exploratory data analysis.

Variables to plots

```{r}
selectInput( inputId = "xaxis", "X variable:", names(bad_drivers), selected = 'perc_speeding')
selectInput( inputId = "yaxis", "Y variable:", names(bad_drivers), selected = 'perc_alcohol')
```


```{r}
#read about `aes_string`. You want to use `aes_string` instead of `aes` since `selectInput` returns a character.
renderPlot({
ggplot(data = bad_drivers, aes_string(x = input$xaxis, y = input$yaxis))  +
    geom_point()
})

```
